page.title: 13Traffic Census A 605.
page.content: To investigate the traffic that passes through the village on the A 605 we decided to take a census at the corner of the New Inn.We took it in turns,doing half an hour periods from 8.45 to 3.15p.m. We collected the information for various types of vehicles so that we could compare them. Total number of vehicles going towards Raunds was 1218. Cars:-73% Lorries:-10% Vans:-12% Buses:-1% Motor cycles:-1% Pedal cycles:-0.25% Others:-2% Total number of vehicles going towards Thrapston was 882. Cars:-73% Lorries:-10% Vans:-11% Buses:-2% Motor cycles:-1% Pedal cycles:-0.3% Others:- 2%
